description: The VISIT_PREDICTIONS table contains information about when and where in the hospital a patient is expected to be during their visit. This will currently only include projections used for OR throughput.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: EXPECTED_PAT_LOC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient's expected location.

columns.name: EXPECTED_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason for the patient's expected stay in this location.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Preprocedure


Procedure


Recovery


Phase II

columns.name: EXPECTED_START_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which the patient is expected to arrive in this location.

columns.name: EXPECTED_DURATION
columns.description: The amount of time (in minutes) a patient is expected to stay in this location.

columns.name: PREDICTION_SRC_FEV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the event that created this prediction.

columns.name: PREDICTION_SRC_PND_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the pending record that created this prediction.

columns.name: PREDICTION_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which this prediction was made.

columns.name: PREDICTION_CAUSE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason or event that triggered this prediction to be made.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Appointment Scheduled


Preassignment Location Updated


Surgical Case Scheduled

columns.name: ACTIVE_PRED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this prediction is the most current.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: UPDATED_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who manually entered this prediction.
